data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Dasilva, Marcio Bernardino, Pinto-Da-Rocha, Ricardo (2012): Descriptions of Thereza murutinga sp. nov. and Pristocnemis caipira sp. nov., and new records of Caelopyginae (Opiliones: Laniatores: Gonyleptidae). Zootaxa 3317: 25-38, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.281134
